Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.socket

package it.polimi.ingsw.server.socket

  • Class
    Description
    ServerSocketManager
    Server-specific SocketManager interface in charge of specifying the flow of packets expected by the server
    ServerSocketManagerImpl
    Actual implementation of ServerSocketManager.
    SocketConnectionServerController
    Socket-based service implementation which clients can use to establish a connection with the server.
    SocketLobbyServerUpdater
    Socket LobbyUpdater implementation which forwards requests to the client using packets
    SocketServerGameController
    Socket GameController implementation which listens for incoming packets from a socket and calls the corresponding methods on the protocol agnostic GameServerController.
    SocketServerGameUpdater
    Socket GameUpdater implementation which forwards requests to the client using packets
    SocketServerLobbyController
    Socket GameController implementation which listens for incoming packets from a socket and calls the corresponding methods on the protocol agnostic LobbyServerController.
